articles.author: Anthony Salvanto, Jennifer De Pinto, Fred Backus, Kabir Khanna
articles.title: CBS News poll — Trump has positive approval amid "energetic" opening weeks; seen as doing what he promised - CBS News
articles.description: Trump's deportation plans are popular, but Americans say there's not enough focus on lowering prices.
articles.content: With most describing him as "tough," "energetic," "focused" and "effective" — and as doing what he'd promised during his campaign — President Trump has started his term with net positive marks from A… [+4242 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s assault on public health and the growing threat of an H5N1 bird flu pandemic - WSWS
articles.description: Over the past week, a series of developments have reaffirmed the imminent danger of an H5N1 “bird flu” pandemic, for which American and world capitalism are wholly unprepared.
articles.content:
Employees clean parts of the cages and take the last chickens to be slaughtered inside a poultry store, Friday, February 7, 2025, in New York. [AP Photo/Andres Kudacki]
